short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover, copy, and organize colors from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Finder helps users easily get HEX codes from any webpage and generate color palettes. It provides an intuitive interface for selecting colors, viewing recent selections, and generating color palettes. 

Features:
- EyeDropper
- Recently picked colors
- Generate color palettes from the most recent color
- Manage colors and palettes
- Copy-to-clipboard for picked colors and palettes
- Clear all picked colors

To use: 
✓ After installing, visit any webpage from where you want to grab a color
✓ Click on the extension and click on "Get Color"
✓ Click on the desired point and to get color code in HEX  
✓ Copy the code and repeat

Version 1.0
